name: Subway Cat
description:
Subway Cat Wake up, it’s escaping!

A little cat is chasing an evil mouse in a subway station, but the prey quickly starts running towards the railway. Help the cat catch the mouse!

Beware of the trains!

They pass every 10 seconds 😉.

And the reward?

Try to collect as many coins as you can, as fast as you can!

Controls

WASD - to move
ESC - to pause

A game by:

Zoe Cazas Telias - 2D Artist (Image Campus student)
Lucas Cazas Telias - Programmer

Game developed in less than 72hs for the game jam Ludum Dare 51.

https://www.imagecampus.edu.ar/
